Class BoardModel

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

        public boolean validPosition(int x,
                             int y)
        Checks if given coordinates are within the board's bounds
        Parameters:
        x - coordinates' x-value
        y - coordinates' y-value
        Returns:
        true if both values lie within [0,7], false otherwise

      • getValidMove

        public MoveModel getValidMove(int x,
                              int y,
                              char piece)
        Checks if a move at given coordinates is valid and returns it if so
        Parameters:
        x - move's x-coordinate
        y - move's y-coordinate
        piece - move's piece's color
        Returns:
        the move in a MoveModel object (containing its effects on the board) if it's valid, null otherwise

      • checkValidDirection

        public boolean checkValidDirection(MoveModel move,
                                   int[] direction)
        Checks if a move is valid in a given direction and stores to-be rotated pieces if so
        Parameters:
        move - the move to be tested
        direction - the direction to be tested
        Returns:
        true if move is valid in given direction (rotates at least one piece in it), false otherwise

        Returns:
        amount of pieces of that color on the board
